name: Image Hover Effects for Visual Composer
author: zafar ullah joiya

sections.description:
Image Hover Effect for Visual Composer Has great Hover Effects with on scroll animation.Unlimited Backgrounds Colors.its help to create images with hover effects and scrolling animation.it will allow.

Image Hover Effects for visual composer is an amazing addon that will allow you to add 90+ hover effects to images with captions.This add-on add CSS3 transitions of hover thumbnail to the Visual Composer. Most of the transitions have 4 type of directions

See Live DEMO Here
want something more ?
Get Pro

Features

  • Pure CSS3 Effects
  • Fully Responsive
  • 20+ Hover Effects
  • Light weight
  • Easy to Use
  • Circle and sqaure
  • Both transition support left_to_right, right_to_left, top_to_bottom and bottom_to_top.

PRO Features

  • 100% Responsive
  • 90+ Hover effects
  • Custom Width
  • Custom Height
  • Caption Colors control
  • Heading Background Colors control
  • Caption Background Colour control
  • Custom Border Width
  • Custom Border Color
  • 24/7 Support
  • Regular Updates
sections.installation:
Note: You require Visual Composer WordPress plugin Installed to use this Addon

  1. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select ‘add new’
  2. Search for ‘Image Hover Effects for Visual Composer’ and install it
  3. Go to Pages or Posts and add “Image Hover Effects” in content section in your pages.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Note: You require Visual Composer WordPress plugin Installed to use this Addon

  1. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select ‘add new’
  2. Search for ‘Image Hover Effects for Visual Composer’ and install it
  3. Go to Pages or Posts and add “Image Hover Effects” in content section in your pages.
